Friday, July 1, 2005

Ruby on Rails running on a Zaurus PDA

Posted by admin

From our Japanese friends comes a great series of pictures showing Ruby on Rails running on the Zaurus PDA! Rails has gone mobile, baby. That’s pretty darn cool. In a way trivial as it’s “just Linux”, but I’m impressed regardless.
